author: starwarsgeek101_
title: Not good :(
review: I actually got this or free but I now know why this was for free, IT STINKS! The 14-minute video is not very amusing and is a waste. Do not get it if you are looking for something to watch. Honestly, you probably wouldn't want this.

author: hustla187
title: blah
review: I don't know why Lego would make a VHS when the DVD is kicking into high gear. The Jack Stone theme was a very boring theme and is very short. It could have been better if it was in stop motion form, but Lego doesn't do that. Don't waste your time on this.

author: f_man
title: Ugh...
review:
Puh-lease. The ones who received this VHS should throw it away. Such a waste of time. 
I got this for free and wished I hadn't. Good thing it "Stragely Disappeared" from my video closet.

Pros:
None

Cons:
Waste of time for LEGO!
Waste of time for ME!

author: z
title: 3901 Jack Stone Video
review:
I remember when I received this in the mail free one day.  I watched it as soon I could and absolutely loved it.

However, now that I am a few years older, it does not bring the thrills it originally did.  I still might enjoy it to a certain extent, but the great excitement it brought was not lasting.

As for a recommendation, I would say get it as cheap as you can.  Anyone under the age of 10 might find this amusing;  I know I certainly did.  For anyone over the age of 10, I would really not bother watching it unless you have the time, and have an, shall we say, interesting sense of humor (like I do!)  I will probably watch it again for nostalgic reasons. 

Your humble servant, 

                                       Z
